SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Connection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIConnection, SocketConnection
public abstract class Connection extends Object implements Observer
This class is the abstract class that represents the connection between the server and the client. It is extended by RMIConnection and SocketConnection.

    • setLobby

      public abstract void setLobby(Controller controller)
      This method sets the lobby of the connection.
      Parameters:
      controller - is the controller that represents the lobby.

    • getLobby

      public abstract Controller getLobby()
      This method returns the lobby of the connection.
      Returns:
      the controller that represents the lobby.

    • sendMessage

      public abstract void sendMessage(Message message)
      This method sends a message to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that has to be sent.

    • joinGame

      public abstract void joinGame(List<Integer> startingGamesId, List<Integer> gamesWhitDisconnectionsId)
      This method asks the client whether it wants to create, join or reconnect to a lobby.
      Parameters:
      startingGamesId - is the list of the id of the games that are starting.
      gamesWhitDisconnectionsId - is the list of the id of the games that have disconnections.

    • createGame

      public abstract void createGame()
      This method handles the action of creating a game.

    • getUsername

      public abstract String getUsername()
      This method gets the username of the connection.
      Returns:
      the username of the connection.

    • ping

      public abstract void ping()
      This method sends a ping message to the client.

    • reconnect

      public abstract void reconnect(Connection oldConnection)
      This method reconnects the connection.
      Parameters:
      oldConnection - is the old connection that belonged to the user and will be replaced by the new one.

    • sendChatMessage

      public abstract void sendChatMessage(String message, Connection receiver)
      This method sends a chat message to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that has to be sent.
      receiver - is the connection that has to receive the message.

    • sendChatMessage

      public abstract void sendChatMessage(String message)
      This method sends a chat message to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that has to be sent.

    • removeFromServer

      public abstract void removeFromServer(boolean last)
      This method removes the connection from the server.
      Parameters:
      last - is a boolean that is true if the connection is the last one to be removed.
